entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
We cannot ignore #COVID19 because it’s inconvenient or we’re ready to go back to normal.

If we work together, we can flatten the curve.

Wear a mask. Wash your hands. Physically distance. Take this SERIOUSLY. #YourActionsSaveLives
